common.securityNoticeDesc: 1. External accounts are for storage payments. 2. The Privacy Layer (Optional) uses a Master Password to encrypt files locally and protect storage account keys. If not active, uploads will be public.
common.unlockRequired: Privacy protection is currently inactive. Activate to enable E2EE features.
common.tryDifferentKeywords: Try different keywords or check spelling
common.enterFileNameOrKeywords: Enter file name or keywords to search
common.searchErrorHint: Note: Arweave search can only find recent transactions. If no results are found, try different keywords
common.searchLimitHint: Note: Search only finds recent transactions (up to 5000). If no results are found, try different keywords
common.searchCapabilitiesDesc:
• Supports partial matching for file names and descriptions
• By default, only searches files you uploaded
• Enter transaction ID (43 chars) to search any file
• Supports multi-word search (space-separated)

unlock.title: Activate Secure Vault
unlock.desc: Enter your master password to unlock accounts and enable file encryption.
unlock.accessDesc: Enter your master password. If you forgot it, simply enter a new one to start a fresh account management vault.
unlock.initDesc: This is your first time. Set a master password to protect your account information and enable end-to-end file encryption.
unlock.warning: Your password is never sent to any server. It is used locally to derive your encryption keys.
unlock.forgotWarning: ⚠️ Important: If you forget this password, you will lose access to your encrypted files and saved accounts forever.
unlock.errorLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
unlock.successInit: Master password set and vault initialized

identities.title: Account List
identities.emptyState: No {{chain}} accounts found in this vault.
identities.vaultDesc: You are currently inside a private compartment. Only data added with this password is visible.
identities.securityItem2: Vault is automatically locked when the session ends.
identities.securityItem3: We never store your master password.
identities.viewSensitiveDesc: Confirm your master password to decrypt the private key for {{alias}}.
identities.aliasPrompt: Enter an alias for this account:
identities.successGenerated: New storage account generated and downloaded!
identities.mnemonicDesc: Confirm your master password to decrypt the mnemonic for {{alias}}.
identities.sensitiveWarning: Please keep your private keys and mnemonics secure. Leaking this information will result in asset loss.
identities.confirmPassword: Enter your master password to view sensitive information
identities.dangerZone: ⚠️ Danger Zone: Keep the following information secure and never share it with anyone
identities.noMnemonic: No mnemonic found for this account (it might have been imported via private key).
identities.paymentDesc: Externally connected account, used for paying storage fees.
identities.connectExternalDesc: Connect external wallet accounts without importing private keys
identities.deleteAccountDesc: You are about to delete {{alias}}. This action cannot be undone.
identities.deleteAccountWarningDesc: Deleting this account removes its local key from your vault. If you have no backup, you may lose access to related data.
identities.deleteArWarningDesc: Deleting this AR account removes your local key and may make uploaded data inaccessible if you have no backup. Please confirm after the countdown.
identities.switchAccountHint: Please use the account management button to switch accounts
identities.switchAccountInModal: Please select the account to switch in the account management interface
identities.switchAccountFailed: Failed to switch account, please switch manually
identities.configSyncDesc: Export or import configuration to sync account information across devices
identities.exportConfigDesc: Export all account configurations from the current vault, including encrypted private keys and metadata
identities.verifyPasswordForExport: Enter master password to confirm export
identities.exportSecurityNotice: Security Notice: Exported configuration file contains sensitive information
identities.exportSecurityTip1: The configuration file contains encrypted private keys. Keep it secure and never share it with anyone
identities.exportSecurityTip2: It is recommended to store the file on encrypted storage devices or in a password manager
identities.exportSecurityTip3: If the file is compromised, immediately transfer assets and regenerate keys
identities.importConfigDesc: Import configuration from another device to restore account information to the current vault
identities.importSuccess: Configuration imported successfully! Imported {{wallets}} wallets and {{metadata}} metadata entries
identities.importPartialSuccess: Partially imported: {{wallets}} wallets imported, but {{errors}} errors occurred
identities.importPasswordHint: Enter the source vault password used when exporting the config, to decrypt imported wallet keys
identities.importPasswordRequired: Please enter the source vault password
identities.importPasswordIncorrect: Incorrect password, unable to decrypt wallet keys
identities.selectConfigFileFirst: Please select a config file first

history.title: Your Storage History
history.desc: View and manage your uploaded file records. Only files owned by the current account can be decrypted and downloaded.
history.emptyDesc: Start uploading your first file to the blockchain
history.errorOwner: This file does not belong to the current account. Please switch to the correct account and try again.
history.errorLocked: Account is locked. Please unlock your account before downloading files.
history.successDownloadEncrypted: Encrypted file downloaded. Unlock your account to download decrypted version.
history.downloadEncrypted: Downloading encrypted file. Unlock your account to download decrypted version.
history.decryptDownloadTooltip: Unlock account to download decrypted file
history.unlockToDecrypt: Please unlock your account to download decrypted files. Go to Account page to unlock.
history.chunkErrorHint: The file data may not be fully seeded to the Arweave network yet. This usually happens with large files or recently uploaded transactions. Please try again in a few minutes or check the transaction status.
history.accountSetupHint: Set up a master password or connect an external wallet to view and manage your file records.

upload.arweaveDesc: Store your data permanently on a decentralized network. Data is distributed across multiple nodes, ensuring permanent preservation.
upload.compressionNotRecommended: Compression Not Recommended for This File Type
upload.arweaveSelectAccount: Select or add a storage account:
upload.arweaveNoAccount: No account found. Create or import one to continue:
upload.arweaveLockedHint: Privacy Vault is locked. Activate to manage accounts and enable encrypted uploads.
upload.unlockHint: Go to Account Management to set up your master password, or link an external account to get started.
upload.needAccountToUpload: Please select or create a storage account
upload.unlockOrSelectAccount: Set master password or select account
upload.unlockToSelectFile: Go to Account Management to set up your master password, or link an external account
upload.feeInfoDesc: Decentralized network provides permanent storage with dynamically calculated fees based on data size
upload.feeInfoItem1: Fees are dynamically calculated based on file size and network conditions
upload.feeInfoItem2: Small files (< 100KB) typically cost only a few cents
upload.feeInfoItem3: Data will be permanently stored on the decentralized network
upload.feeEstimatedNote: Note: This is an estimate based on current network conditions. Actual fees may vary slightly.
upload.feeErrorHint: Please check your network connection or try again later. You can also visit the fee calculator to check
upload.dragDropHint: Click or drag file here to upload
upload.encryptionDesc: Your file will be encrypted before upload for maximum security
upload.compressionDesc: Compress file to reduce storage costs (recommended for text-based files)
upload.duplicateFileDesc: File {{name}} is already in the list and cannot be added again
upload.duplicateFilesDesc: The following files are already in the list and have been skipped: {{names}}
upload.oneClickCreateArHint: If you only have ETH/SOL/SUI wallets, create an AR storage account in one click. We will auto-switch to it so you can continue uploading.
upload.autoCreateArSuccess: AR account created and switched automatically: {{alias}}
upload.swapRequiredDesc: To pay with {{token}}, a swap is required first.
upload.swapTimeDesc: Usually ~1-3 minutes depending on network confirmation.
upload.redirectWarningDesc: After completing swap/bridge, you may need to re-upload the file.

settings.title: Settings
settings.languageSettingsDesc: Choose your preferred language for the interface
settings.languageDesc: Select the language for the user interface
settings.storageSettingsDesc: Manage storage usage and clear application data
settings.dangerZoneDesc: Irreversible actions. Please proceed with caution.
settings.clearDataDesc: This will permanently delete all data including files, folders, accounts, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
settings.confirmDesc: Are you absolutely sure? This will permanently delete:
settings.clearSuccess: All data cleared successfully. The page will refresh shortly.
settings.clearSuccessWithCacheNote: Application data cleared. Note: Browser HTTP cache ({{size}}) cannot be cleared programmatically. Please clear browser cache manually to free up space.
settings.clearError: Failed to clear data. Please try again.
settings.clearTimeout: Clear operation timed out. Please try again or refresh the page.
settings.storageInfoDesc: View storage usage and OPFS file information
settings.storageNote: Note: Storage quota updates may be delayed by the browser. If files are deleted but usage doesn't decrease immediately, wait a few minutes or refresh the page.
settings.storageNote1: The 'Storage Usage' shows the total storage used by this origin (including IndexedDB, Cache Storage, etc.), not just OPFS files.
settings.storageNote2: The actual OPFS file sizes are shown above. An empty database file should be only a few KB.
settings.storageNote3: Browser storage quota updates may be delayed. If usage doesn't decrease immediately after clearing, wait a few minutes.
settings.storageNote4: Note: The displayed storage usage ({{total}}) is much larger than the actual OPFS files ({{opfs}}). This may include cached data from other storage types that will be cleaned up automatically.
settings.storageWarning1: The fileSystem storage ({{fileSystem}}) is much larger than actual OPFS files ({{opfs}}).
settings.storageWarning2: This likely includes browser-cached files from previous file downloads (e.g., when syncing files from Arweave to calculate hashes).
settings.storageWarning4Detail: Press Ctrl+Shift+Delete (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+Delete (Mac), then select 'Cached images and files' and click 'Clear data'
settings.storageWarning5: Or wait for browser to automatically clean up old cache (may take hours or days)
settings.storageWarning6: Note: This cache is managed by the browser and cannot be cleared by the application. It does not affect application functionality.

dex.title: Swap
dex.description: Multi-hop exchange powered by Uniswap V3
dex.slippageTooltip: Transaction will revert if price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage
dex.howItWorksItem1: Multi-hop swaps use Uniswap V3 liquidity pools
dex.howItWorksItem2: Smart routing finds the best path for your swap
dex.howItWorksItem3: Real-time gas estimation helps you understand requirements
dex.howItWorksItem4: Slippage protection prevents unfavorable price changes
dex.smartRoutingFeature1: Automatically finds the best swap route
dex.smartRoutingFeature2: Multi-hop swapping through WETH when needed
dex.securityFeature1: Powered by audited Uniswap V3 protocol
dex.howItWorksDesc: Our swap module uses the MultiHopSwapper contract to execute swaps via Uniswap V3, automatically routing through the most efficient path to get you the best results.
dex.accountSelectionHint: Please choose account and token based on Account settings before swap or bridge.
dex.uploadRetryHint: After completing swap/bridge, return to Upload and submit again.

notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Return to home to continue.
